name: Crimson Orchard Cherry & Dark Chocolate Clusters
description: Indulge in the perfect harmony of tangy cherries and rich dark chocolate with our Crimson Orchard Cherry & Dark Chocolate Clusters. Each bite combines dried, hand-picked cherries with velvety 70% cacao chocolate, resulting in a luxurious snack that’s both tart and sweet. Great as an afternoon pick-me-up or an elegant dessert topping, these clusters are crafted in small batches to preserve their vibrant flavor and chewy-crunchy texture. Free from artificial flavors and gluten, they’re a treat you can feel good about savoring.

attributes.ingredients: Dried cherries, dark chocolate (cocoa mass, sugar, cocoa butter, soy lecithin), sea salt
attributes.allergen_info: Contains soy. Made in a facility that processes nuts.
attributes.storage: Store in a cool, dry place
